CustomField.description: Field to store JSON of Parent Account. Used to show data to affiliates in Community without bypassing sharing rules.
CustomField.formula: '{"isB2C": ' + IF(Parent.IsPersonAccount, 'true', 'false') + ', "isAffiliate": ' + IF(COMM_ParentAccount__r.COMM_IsAffiliate__c, 'true', 'false') + ', "companyEmail": "'+ COMM_ParentAccount__r.COMM_Email__c + '","companyName": "' + COMM_ParentAccount__r.Name + '","companyVATNumber": "' + COMM_ParentAccount__r.COMM_VATNumber__c + '","companyCountry": "' + TEXT(COMM_ParentAccount__r.BillingCountryCode) + '","companyCity": "' + COMM_ParentAccount__r.BillingCity + '","companyZipCode": "' + COMM_ParentAccount__r.BillingPostalCode + '","companyAddress": "' + COMM_ParentAccount__r.BillingStreet+ '"}'
CustomField.label: Parent Account Data
